name: EPUB, Electronic Publication, Version 3
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">epub</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A format for electronic publications with reflowable text in marked up document structure with associated images for illustrations, packaged in a ZIP-based container format (OCF).  EPUB Version 3 also provides for audio, including synchronization of text and audio, and for text-to-speech synthesis.
